summary: This test module validates the behavior of the lowest‑latency routing strategy in the Litellm library. It sets up mock deployments, exercises helper utilities, and runs a series of unit tests that verify deployment discovery, rate‑limit enforcement, latency measurement, TTL handling, buffering, first‑pick logic, time‑to‑first‑token tracking, timeout handling, and streaming response support.
business_intent: To guarantee that the routing component reliably selects the fastest available model deployment while respecting usage limits and maintaining performance metrics, thereby ensuring high‑quality, low‑latency AI service delivery in production environments.
